A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sorry - on second viewing my like this more - but really slight story - too many plot contrivances. Adam Driver saves it. There were a couple of amazing shots\, couple of funny points. A lot to wrap up in the next instalment. Maybe the template is just too predictable now - but then without that you lose Star Wars. Maybe I would have enjoyed and connected with it more if I wasn't in physical pain having sat through The Force Awakens as part of a double bill\,
